EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your store has been identified as ready and eligible to enable Target. Part of the implementation process is to have the Target admin within the store complete the online training video.
The link provided below takes you to that video and produces the testing required to turn on the product.
Please click this link
https://www.brainshark.com/cox/vu?pi=zHazKUadCzIbsGz0
to start the video. Reporting is received on a nightly basis.
Respectfully,
